wiki.content:
"Bullet with Butterfly Wings" is a song by American alternative rock band The Smashing Pumpkins. It was the lead single from the band's 1995 double album Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness. The song won the 1997 Grammy Award for Best Hard Rock Performance. It was the band's first Top 40 US hit, peaking at number 22 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was also named the 91st best hard rock song of all time by VH1.

It was the lead single from the band's 1995 double album Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness. The song won the 1997 Grammy Award for Best Hard Rock Performance. It was the band's first Top 40 US hit, peaking at number 22 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was also named the 91st best hard rock song of all time by VH1.
